resource_requirements: RAM (especially for the in-memory GRASS database)
other: The script uses a variety of tools and libraries, including GDAL, GRASS GIS, and the GNU Core Utilities.
The script processes data from various sources, including GMTED2010, MERRAero, MODALB, and AE_C6_MYD04_L2.
The script uses a variety of environmental variables to configure the execution environment.
